mods.abstract: $20 REWARD. RAN AWAY from the undersigned, in Grand Coteau, on the 27th of January last, a mulatto-woman named Rachel, aged about 24 years, having one should higher than the other and one of her toes off. It is reasonable to suppose that she is lurking about Grand Coteau. The above reward will be given to whoever will bring back said girl to the undersigned, or lodge her in the Jail of this Parish. N. GRIMMER. Grand Coteau, March 4th, 1854.--tf

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
